title: Statistical Estimation
description: Basic theories of statistical estimation, including optimal estimation in finite samples and asymptotically optimal estimation.  A careful mathematical treatment of the primary techniques of estimation utilized by statisticians.

prerequisites: MATH 4262 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
